snippet.title: Pompeii: The Legacy Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Please add Pompeii: The Legacy to your wishlist on Steam:
https://shorturl.at/NUHhu

Pompeii The Legacy is a city-building game set in 100 AD during the reign of Roman Emperor Trajan. The player's task is to rebuild the city of Pompeii, which was devastated by the catastrophic eruption of Mount Vesuvius in 79 AD. Players will reconstruct the city over several centuries, spanning multiple generations of their family, while also climbing the social ladder of the Roman Empire.

The game is heavily inspired by real historical figures and events.
